result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CASES:  14CF46, 14CF298, 15CF298.  Defendant Christopher P Merrill in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Defendant Christopher P Merrill in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 9:41 am  State - Global resolution.  Def waives PSI.  Def to be tranferred to Burnett Cty for other matters.

14CF46:  Ct 1 - Def pleads G.  CT accepts plea finds Def G & enters JOC.  Ct 2 - DRI.

14CF298:  State withdraws Information.  Ct 2 - Def pleads G.  CT accepts plea, finds Def G & enters JOC.  Ct 1 - DRI.

15CF298:  DRI

SENTENCING:
14CF46 (Ct 1) - I/S - 3.5 yr.  1.5 IC, 2 ES.  3 yrs prob.  Absolute Sobriety, Subj to testing upon reasonable suspicion.  AODA.  6 mo PCJ cond time banked/stayed to be used by prob if necessary.  NO contact w/Christina Lowe.  $296.60 fine/costs.  $250.00 DNA surch.  

14CF298 (Ct 2) - 26 days Jail - time served.  $265.60 fine/costs.  $200 DNA surch.  

PP - $25/mo beg 11/1/15 & 1st of e/m thereafter.  PCR.  Cannot vote.  Cannot possess firearms.  Tribe to determine who is eligible to vote in tribal elections.  CT does not make a decision on that.   10:03 am adj.

Defendant Christopher P Merrill in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Defendant Christopher P Merrill in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:13 pm.  CT-request is denied.  1:21 pm adj.
plea of NG and defense motions

Absolute Sobriety.  Must have clean UA before release from jail.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Other: no drugs not prescribed to defendant.

Defendant Christopher P Merrill in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Defendant Christopher P Merrill in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 1:26pm Underlying Br 1: 14CF46, 14CF298. State- add'l charges in Burnett & St Croix County. Atty Biller moves to dismiss 15CF298. 1:33pm adj.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
